医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
有前途的基因疗法可能会改变心力衰竭的治疗一种新的基因疗法可以在大型动物模型中逆转心力衰竭的影响并恢复心脏功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Promising-gene-therapy-could-transform-heart-failure-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Promising-gene-therapy-could-transform-heart-failure-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e240a7-cb79-486b-a919-c9c869312ecc Tue, 10 Dec 2024 06:53:00 -0500 Promising gene therapy could transform heart failure treatment
每天颤抖 1 小时可能会增强葡萄糖耐量和代谢健康每日寒冷暴露并颤抖 10 天可改善肥胖个体的葡萄糖耐量和代谢健康，凸显颤抖的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Shivering-for-1-hour-a-day-may-boost-glucose-tolerance-and-metabolic-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Shivering-for-1-hour-a-day-may-boost-glucose-tolerance-and-metabolic-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=584b9b5b-8863-40ea-8bd2-8751068d1e9b Tue, 10 Dec 2024 06:33:00 -0500 Shivering for 1 hour a day may boost glucose tolerance and metabolic health
百岁老人独居、积极、投入，茁壮成长“未来就在这里，”电子邮件宣布。当时 88 岁的希尔达·贾菲 (Hilda Jaffe) 让她的孩子们知道她计划出售位于新泽西州维罗纳的家。她决定在曼哈顿地狱厨房的一间一居室公寓里开始自己的新生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/A-centenarian-thrives-living-alone-active-and-engged.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/A-centenarian-thrives-living-alone-active-and-engged.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=719c6ca0-61ef-4495-891f-eafa28010161 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 06:20:19 -0500 A centenarian thrives living alone, active and engaged
好消息：黑巧克力可降低 2 型糖尿病风险研究结果显示，黑巧克力可以降低 2 型糖尿病的风险，而牛奶巧克力则有助于体重增加。讨论了饮食选择的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Sweet-news-Dark-chocolate-reduces-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Sweet-news-Dark-chocolate-reduces-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c881f6e5-7441-4fd5-823a-bd965ad5ae3f Tue, 10 Dec 2024 05:56:00 -0500 Sweet news: Dark chocolate reduces type 2 diabetes risk
人体血液中检测到的微塑料与凝血标记物的改变有关研究结果表明，血液中的微塑料与炎症和凝血标志物有关，这强调了减少接触和进一步研究的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Micro Plastics-Detected-in- human-blood-linked-to-altered-coagulation-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Micro Plastics-Detected-in- human-blood-linked-to-altered-coagulation-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2effeeb5-bf82-485d-8ed9-b78f760b36d9 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 05:25:00 -0500 Microplastics detected in human blood linked to altered coagulation markers
地中海饮食可降低炎症性肠病的风险研究表明，地中海饮食支持炎症性肠病的治疗，通过 omega-3 脂肪酸等营养物质增强肠道微生物群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1bcf0d4-4dd1-4d2e-adc5-123a596903ff Tue, 10 Dec 2024 04:57:00 -0500 Mediterranean diet linked to reduced risk of inflammatory bowel disease
研究人员在硬脑膜窦和颅骨中发现脑体免疫联系伦敦国王学院精神病学、心理学和神经科学研究所 (IoPPN) 的新研究为脑-体免疫连接提供了宝贵的见解，确定了脑后部硬脑膜窦和颅骨骨髓中的关键通信枢纽。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Researchers-find-brain-body-immune-link-in-the-dural-sinuses-and-skull-marrow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Researchers-find-brain-body-immune-link-in-the-dural-sinuses-and-skull-marrow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ee7ec0a-15b0-4fd6-8541-c8def7ef1f5c Tue, 10 Dec 2024 00:17:04 -0500 Researchers find brain-body immune link in the dural sinuses and skull marrow
晚吃早餐可降低 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖峰值不早吃早餐可能会降低 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖峰值，而晚吃早餐则显示出显着的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Eating-breakfast-later-lowers-blood-sugar-spikes-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Eating-breakfast-later-lowers-blood-sugar-spikes-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fc007e7-a289-4a32-ac45-031a9072ed89 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 00:05:00 -0500 Eating breakfast later lowers blood sugar spikes in type 2 diabetes patients
经济困难仍然阻碍许多哮喘患者服用药物呼吸医学杂志在线发表的一项研究表明，尽管过去十年中因费用问题而无法按处方服药的哮喘患者人数有所下降，但经济困难仍然是六分之一的哮喘患者的阻碍因素胸部。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Financial-hardship-still-prevents-many-asthma-病人-from-takeing-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241210/Financial-hardship-still-prevents-many-asthma-病人-from-take-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e060307-2015-479f-9e8b-ecc2ae1b9389 Tue, 10 Dec 2024 00:01:29 -0500 Financial hardship still prevents many asthma patients from taking medications
新的三联疗法为复发和新诊断的白血病带来希望由德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员领导的三项临床试验表明，新型三联疗法在治疗复发性或难治性和新诊断的白血病方面取得了显着的积极效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-triplet-therapies-show-promise-for-relapsed-and-newly-diagnosed-leukemias.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-triplet-therapies-show-promise-for-relapsed-and-newly-diagnosed-leukemias.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11ae7783-33be-4761-8535-da0bb9860ab2 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 23:45:09 -0500 New triplet therapies show promise for relapsed and newly diagnosed leukemias
